meanings.definition: A type of antioxidant found in tea and certain fruits.
meanings.sent1: Green tea is rich in catechins, which help protect our cells from damage.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the health benefits of catechins by drinking green tea regularly.
meanings.sent3: The catechins in tea were having a party in my cup, celebrating their antioxidant powers.
meanings.sent4: Her body was like a fortress, fortified by the catechins from the fruits she ate.
meanings.sent5: Picture catechins as tiny superheroes, swooping in to save the day by fighting off harmful molecules.

meanings.definition: A group of compounds known for their health benefits.
meanings.sent1: Researchers have been studying the effects of catechins on overall well-being.
meanings.sent2: The group of compounds called catechins are believed to promote good health.
meanings.sent3: At the health food store, the catechins were gossiping about their latest wellness achievements.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of health, catechins bloomed like flowers, spreading their benefits far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of catechins are like a secret treasure chest waiting to be discovered by those who seek good health.
